summary: This mod changes the locks on the thieves guild practice chests so they automatically relock when you close them allowing you to practice your lockpicking to your hearts content.
descriptionHtml:
*****************************************************************

	                TES: Skyrim
         LFox Better Thieves Guild Practice Locks v1.01
			 Made by LFox

*****************************************************************

     1. INSTALLING THE PLUGIN

*****************************************************************

1. Extract the mod to the Data folder and enable it via the
launcher or mod manager.

*****************************************************************

     2. Mod Load Order

*****************************************************************

This plugin should be fine anywhere in your load order.  It will
be incompatible with anything that modifies the thieves guild
practice chests.

*****************************************************************

     3. Mod Description

*****************************************************************

For some reason the thieves guild practice chests for lockpicking
reset when the cell does.  Making them pretty much worthless to
use to practice or improve your skill on.  This mod adds a simple
script that relocks the chests everytime you close it so you can
practice your lockpicking to your hearts content.

*****************************************************************

     4. Version History

*****************************************************************

v1.01
- Rewrote the scripts, Locks will now properly award xp to your
skill everytime you open one.

v1.0
- Made the plugin
author: LFox
